message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $9,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit from my initial offer, but $10,500 is the lowest I can go.  This still gives you a good deal on a valuable product. Let's see if we can find some middle ground.

I appreciate your willingness to come down from your initial offer, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $10,000. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
